00024 #ifndef dbDatabaseOffsetBits 
00025 #ifdef LARGE_DATABASE_SUPPORT
00026 #define dbDatabaseOffsetBits 40 // up to 1 terabyte
00027 #else
00028 #define dbDatabaseOffsetBits 32 // 37 - 128Gb, 40 - up to 1 terabyte
00029 #endif
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 #ifndef dbDatabaseOidBits 
00033 #define dbDatabaseOidBits 32
00034 #endif
00035 
00039 #if dbDatabaseOidBits > 32
00040 typedef size_t oid_t;  // It will work only for 64-bit OS
00041 #else
00042 typedef nat4 oid_t;
00043 #endif
00044 
00048 #if dbDatabaseOffsetBits > 32
00049 typedef size_t offs_t; // It will work only for 64-bit OS
00050 typedef db_int8 soffs_t; // It will work only for 64-bit OS
00051 #else
00052 typedef nat4 offs_t;
00053 typedef int4 soffs_t;
00054 #endif
00055 
00059 enum dbIndexType { 
00060     HASHED  = 1,                   // hash table
00061     INDEXED = 2,                   // T-Tree
00062     CASE_INSENSITIVE = 4,          // Index is case insensitive
00063 
00064     DB_FIELD_CASCADE_DELETE = 8,   // Used by OWNER macro, do not set it explicitly
00065 
00066     AUTOINCREMENT = 16,            // field is assigned automaticall incremented value
00067 
00068     DB_TIMESTAMP = 256,            // field is used as timestamp (this flag is used by CLI to perfrom proper mapping,
00069                                    // it is not used by C++ API)
00070     DB_FIELD_INHERITED_MASK = ~(HASHED|INDEXED)
00071 };

00077 #define KEY(x, index) \
00078     (*FASTDB_NS::dbDescribeField(new FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor(#x, (char*)&x-(char*)this, \
00079                                                                   sizeof(x), index), x))
00080 
00084 #define FIELD(x) KEY(x, 0)
00085 
00089 typedef int (*dbUDTComparator)(void const*, void const*, size_t);
00090 
00094 typedef unsigned (*dbUDTHashFunction)(void const*, size_t);
00095 
00099 #define UDT(x, index, comparator) \
00100     (*FASTDB_NS::dbDescribeRawField(new FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor(#x, (char*)&x-(char*)this, \
00101                                                                      sizeof(x), index), (FASTDB_NS::dbUDTComparator)comparator))
00102 
00106 #define RAWFIELD(x) UDT(x, 0, &memcmp)
00107 
00111 #define RAWKEY(x, index) UDT(x, index, &memcmp)
00112 
00118 #define RELATION(x,inverse) \
00119     (*FASTDB_NS::dbDescribeField(new FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor(#x, (char*)&x-(char*)this, \
00120                                                                   sizeof(x), 0, #inverse), x))
00121 
00127 #define INDEXED_RELATION(x,inverse) \
00128     (*FASTDB_NS::dbDescribeField(new FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor(#x, (char*)&x-(char*)this, \
00129                                                                   sizeof(x), FASTDB_NS::INDEXED, #inverse), x))
00130  
00131 
00137 #define OWNER(x,member) \
00138     (*FASTDB_NS::dbDescribeField(new FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor(#x, (char*)&x-(char*)this, \
00139                                                                   sizeof(x), FASTDB_NS::DB_FIELD_CASCADE_DELETE, \
00140                                                                   #member), x))
00141 
00144 #define METHOD(x) \
00145     (*FASTDB_NS::dbDescribeMethod(new FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor(#x), &self::x))
00146 
00150 #define SUPERCLASS(x) \
00151     x::dbDescribeComponents(NULL)->adjustOffsets((char*)((x*)this)-(char*)this)
00152 
00157 #define TYPE_DESCRIPTOR(fields) \
00158     FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeComponents(FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor*) { \
00159         return &fields; \
00160     } \
00161     static FASTDB_NS::dbTableDescriptor dbDescriptor 
00162 
00163 
00169 #define CLASS_DESCRIPTOR(name, fields) \
00170     typedef name self; \
00171     FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeComponents(FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor*) { \
00172         return &fields; \
00173     } \
00174     static FASTDB_NS::dbTableDescriptor dbDescriptor

00179 #if (defined(_MSC_VER) && _MSC_VER+0 < 1200) || defined(__MWERKS__)
00180     #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00181         #define GET_TABLE_DESC_PREFIX
00182     #else
00183         #define GET_TABLE_DESC_PREFIX template<>
00184     #endif
00185     #define GET_TABLE_DESC_PARAM(T) <T>(T*)
00186 #else
00187     #define GET_TABLE_DESC_PREFIX
00188     #define GET_TABLE_DESC_PARAM(T) (T*)
00189 #endif

00192     #define TABLE_DESC_PREFIX

00197 #define REGISTER_IN(table, database) \
00198     GET_TABLE_DESC_PREFIX FASTDB_NS::dbTableDescriptor* dbGetTableDescriptor GET_TABLE_DESC_PARAM(table) \
00199       { return &table::dbDescriptor; }            \
00200     static FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeComponentsOf##table() \
00201       { return ((table*)0)->dbDescribeComponents(NULL); }     \
00202     FASTDB_NS::dbTableDescriptor table::dbDescriptor(#table, database, sizeof(table), \
00203                                           &dbDescribeComponentsOf##table)
00204 
00205 #define REGISTER_TEMPLATE_IN(table, database) \
00206     GET_TABLE_DESC_PREFIX FASTDB_NS::dbTableDescriptor* dbGetTableDescriptor GET_TABLE_DESC_PARAM(table) \
00207       { return &table::dbDescriptor; }            \
00208     static FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeComponentsOf##table() \
00209       { return ((table*)0)->dbDescribeComponents(NULL); }     \
00210     TABLE_DESC_PREFIX FASTDB_NS::dbTableDescriptor table::dbDescriptor(#table, database, sizeof(table), \
00211                                           &dbDescribeComponentsOf##table)
00212 
00213 #define REGISTER_IN_NS(ns, table, database)                     \
00214     GET_TABLE_DESC_PREFIX FASTDB_NS::dbTableDescriptor* dbGetTableDescriptor GET_TABLE_DESC_PARAM(ns::table) \
00215     { return &ns::table::dbDescriptor; }                                \
00216     static FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeComponentsOf##ns##__##table() \
00217     { return ((ns::table*)0)->dbDescribeComponents(NULL); }             \
00218     FASTDB_NS::dbTableDescriptor ns::table::dbDescriptor(ns##__##table, database, sizeof(ns::table), \
00219                                                          &dbDescribeComponentsOf##ns##__##table)
00220 
00221 #define REGISTER_TEMPLATE_IN_NS(ns, table, database)                     \
00222     GET_TABLE_DESC_PREFIX FASTDB_NS::dbTableDescriptor* dbGetTableDescriptor GET_TABLE_DESC_PARAM(ns::table) \
00223     { return &ns::table::dbDescriptor; }                                \
00224     static FASTDB_NS::dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeComponentsOf##ns##__##table() \
00225     { return ((ns::table*)0)->dbDescribeComponents(NULL); }             \
00226     TABLE_DESC_PREFIX FASTDB_NS::dbTableDescriptor ns::table::dbDescriptor(ns##__##table, database, sizeof(ns::table), \
00227                                                          &dbDescribeComponentsOf##ns##__##table)
00228 
00233 #define REGISTER(table) REGISTER_IN(table, NULL)
00234 #define REGISTER_TEMPLATE(table) REGISTER_TEMPLATE_IN(table, NULL)
00235 #define REGISTER_NS(ns, table) REGISTER_IN_NS(ns, table, NULL)
00236 #define REGISTER_TEMPLATE_NS(ns, table) REGISTER_TEMPLATE_IN_NS(ns, table, NULL)
00237 
00242 #define DETACHED_TABLE ((FASTDB_NS::dbDatabase*)-1)
00243 #define REGISTER_UNASSIGNED(table) REGISTER_IN(table, DETACHED_TABLE)
00244 #define REGISTER_TEMPLATE_UNASSIGNED(table) REGISTER_TEMPLATE_IN(table, DETACHED_TABLE)
00245 #define REGISTER_UNASSIGNED_NS(ns, table) REGISTER_IN_NS(ns, table, DETACHED_TABLE)
00246 #define REGISTER_TEMPLATE_UNASSIGNED_NS(ns, table) REGISTER_TEMPLATE_IN_NS(ns, table, DETACHED_TABLE)

00555 
00560     dbFieldDescriptor* getFirstComponent() { 
00561         return components;
00562     }
00563 
00568     dbFieldDescriptor* getNextComponent(dbFieldDescriptor* field) { 
00569         if (field != NULL) { 
00570             field = field->next;
00571             if (field == components) { 
00572                 return NULL;
00573             }
00574         }
00575         return field;
00576     }
00577         
00581     dbFieldDescriptor& operator, (dbFieldDescriptor& field) { 
00582         dbFieldDescriptor* tail = field.prev;
00583         tail->next = this;
00584         prev->next = &field;
00585         field.prev = prev;
00586         prev = tail;
00587         return *this;
00588     }
00589 
00590     void* operator new(size_t size EXTRA_DEBUG_NEW_PARAMS);
00591     void  operator delete(void* p EXTRA_DEBUG_NEW_PARAMS);
00592 
00596     dbFieldDescriptor& adjustOffsets(size_t offs);
00597 
00607     dbFieldDescriptor(char const* name, size_t offs, size_t size, int indexType, 
00608                       char const* inverse = NULL,
00609                       dbFieldDescriptor* components = NULL);
00610 
00615     dbFieldDescriptor(char const* name);
00616 
00620     ~dbFieldDescriptor();
00621 
00622     dbFieldDescriptor& comparator(dbUDTComparator cmp) {
00623         _comparator = cmp;
00624         return *this;
00625     }
00626 
00627     dbFieldDescriptor& hashcode(dbUDTHashFunction hashcode) {
00628         _hashcode = hashcode;
00629         return *this;
00630     }
00631 
00632     dbFieldDescriptor* setStringType(int appType);
00633     dbFieldDescriptor* setWStringType(int appType);
00634 };

00971 struct dbVarying {

00979 struct dbField { 
00980     enum FieldTypes { 
00981         tpBool,
00982         tpInt1,
00983         tpInt2,
00984         tpInt4,
00985         tpInt8,
00986         tpReal4, 
00987         tpReal8, 
00988         tpString,
00989         tpReference,
00990         tpArray,
00991         tpMethodBool,
00992         tpMethodInt1,
00993         tpMethodInt2,
00994         tpMethodInt4,
00995         tpMethodInt8,
00996         tpMethodReal4,
00997         tpMethodReal8,
00998         tpMethodString,
00999         tpMethodReference,
01000         tpStructure,
01001         tpRawBinary, 
01002         tpStdString,
01003         tpRectangle,
01004         tpWString,
01005         tpStdWString,
01006         tpMethodWString,
01007         tpUnknown
01008     };
01009         
01013     dbVarying name;    
01014 
01018     dbVarying tableName; 
01019 
01023     dbVarying inverse; 
01024     
01028 #ifdef OLD_FIELD_DESCRIPTOR_FORMAT
01029     int4      type;
01030 #else 
01031 #if BYTE_ORDER == BIG_ENDIAN
01032     int4      flags : 24;
01033     int4      type  : 8;
01034 #else
01035     int4      type  : 8;
01036     int4      flags : 24;
01037 #endif
01038 #endif
01039 
01043     int4      offset; 
01044 
01048     nat4      size;
01049 
01053     oid_t     hashTable;
01054 
01058     oid_t     tTree;
01059 };

01130 
01131 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeRawField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, dbUDTComparator comparator)
01132 {
01133     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpRawBinary;
01134     fd->alignment = 1;
01135     fd->_comparator = comparator;
01136     return fd;
01137 }
01138 
01139 
01140 template<class T>
01141 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, T& x) 
01142 { 
01143     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpStructure;
01144     if ((fd->components = x.dbDescribeComponents(fd)) != NULL) { 
01145         fd->elemSize = fd->components->dbsSize;
01146     }
01147     return fd;
01148 }
01149 
01150 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, int1&) 
01151 { 
01152     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpInt1; 
01153     return fd;
01154 }
01155 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, int2&) 
01156 { 
01157     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpInt2; 
01158     return fd;
01159 }
01160 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, int4&) 
01161 { 
01162     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpInt4; 
01163     return fd;
01164 }
01165 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, db_int8&) 
01166 { 
01167     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpInt8; 
01168     return fd;
01169 }
01170 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, nat1&) 
01171 { 
01172     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpInt1; 
01173     return fd;
01174 }
01175 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, nat2&) 
01176 { 
01177     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpInt2; 
01178     return fd;
01179 }
01180 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, nat4&) 
01181 { 
01182     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpInt4; 
01183     return fd;
01184 }
01185 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, nat8&) 
01186 { 
01187     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpInt8; 
01188     return fd;
01189 }
01190 #if SIZEOF_LONG != 8 
01191 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, long&)
01192 {
01193     fd->type = fd->appType = sizeof(long) == 4 ? dbField::tpInt4 : dbField::tpInt8;
01194     return fd;
01195 }
01196 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, unsigned long&)
01197 {
01198     fd->type = fd->appType = sizeof(long) == 4 ? dbField::tpInt4 : dbField::tpInt8;
01199     return fd;
01200 }
01201 #endif
01202 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, bool&) 
01203 { 
01204     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpBool; 
01205     return fd;
01206 }
01207 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, real4&) 
01208 { 
01209     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpReal4; 
01210     return fd;
01211 }
01212 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, real8&) 
01213 { 
01214     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpReal8; 
01215     return fd;
01216 }
01217 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, rectangle&)
01218 {
01219     fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpRectangle;
01220     fd->alignment = sizeof(coord_t);
01221     return fd;
01222 }
01223 #ifdef USE_STD_STRING
01224 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, std::string&)
01225 {
01226     return fd->setStringType(dbField::tpStdString);
01227 }
01228 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, std::wstring&)
01229 {
01230     return fd->setWStringType(dbField::tpStdWString);
01231 }
01232 #endif
01233 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, char const*&) 
01234 { 
01235     return fd->setStringType(dbField::tpString);
01236 }
01237 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, char*&) 
01238 { 
01239     return fd->setStringType(dbField::tpString);
01240 }
01241 
01242 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, wchar_t const*&) 
01243 { 
01244     return fd->setWStringType(dbField::tpWString);
01245 }
01246 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeField(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, wchar_t*&) 
01247 { 
01248     return fd->setWStringType(dbField::tpWString);
01249 }
01250 
01251 
01255 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbAnyMethodTrampoline { 
01256   public:
01257     dbFieldDescriptor* cls;
01258 
01264     virtual void invoke(byte* data, void* result) = 0;
01265 
01272     virtual dbAnyMethodTrampoline* optimize() = 0;
01273 
01278     dbAnyMethodTrampoline(dbFieldDescriptor* fd) { cls = fd; }
01279     
01280     void* operator new(size_t size EXTRA_DEBUG_NEW_PARAMS);
01281     void  operator delete(void* p EXTRA_DEBUG_NEW_PARAMS);
01282 
01286     virtual~dbAnyMethodTrampoline();
01287 };
01288     
01289 
01290 #if defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__VACPP_MULTI__) || defined(__IBMCPP__) || defined(__HP_aCC) || (defined(__SUNPRO_CC) && __SUNPRO_CC >= 0x510 && __SUNPRO_CC_COMPAT == 5)
01291 
01294 template<class T, class R>
01295 class dbMethodTrampoline : public dbAnyMethodTrampoline {
01296   public:
01297     typedef R (T::*mfunc)();
01298 
01299     mfunc              method;
01300     dbFieldDescriptor* cls;
01301     bool               optimized;
01302 
01303     void invoke(byte* data, void* result) {
01304         if (optimized) { 
01305             *(R*)result = (((T*)(data + this->cls->dbsOffs))->*method)();
01306         } else { 
01307             T rec;
01308             this->cls->components->fetchRecordFields((byte*)&rec, data);
01309             *(R*)result = (rec.*method)();
01310         }
01311     }
01312     dbAnyMethodTrampoline* optimize() { 
01313         optimized = true;
01314         return this;
01315     }
01316 
01317     dbMethodTrampoline(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, mfunc f)
01318     : dbAnyMethodTrampoline(fd)
01319     {
01320         this->method = f;
01321         this->cls = fd;
01322         this->optimized = false;
01323     }
01324 };
01325 
01326 #else
01327 
01331 template<class T, class R>
01332 class dbMethodTrampoline : public dbAnyMethodTrampoline { 
01333   public:
01334     typedef R (T::*mfunc)();
01335     mfunc method;
01336     void invoke(byte* data, void* result) {
01337         T rec;
01338         this->cls->components->fetchRecordFields((byte*)&rec, data);
01339         *(R*)result = (rec.*method)();
01340     }
01341     dbAnyMethodTrampoline* optimize();
01342  
01343     dbMethodTrampoline(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, mfunc f) 
01344     : dbAnyMethodTrampoline(fd), method(f) {} 
01345 };
01346 
01347 
01352 template<class T, class R>
01353 class dbMethodFastTrampoline : public dbAnyMethodTrampoline { 
01354     typedef R (T::*mfunc)();
01355     mfunc method;
01356   public:
01357     dbAnyMethodTrampoline* optimize() { 
01358         return this;
01359     }
01360     void invoke(byte* data, void* result) {
01361         *(R*)result = (((T*)(data + this->cls->dbsOffs))->*method)();
01362     }
01363     dbMethodFastTrampoline(dbMethodTrampoline<T,R>* mt) 
01364     : dbAnyMethodTrampoline(mt->cls), method(mt->method) {
01365         delete mt;
01366     }
01367 };
01368 
01369 template<class T, class R>
01370 inline dbAnyMethodTrampoline* dbMethodTrampoline<T,R>::optimize() { 
01371     return new dbMethodFastTrampoline<T,R>(this);
01372 }
01373     
01374 #endif
01375 
01376 template<class T, class R>
01377 inline dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeMethod(dbFieldDescriptor* fd, R (T::*p)()) 
01378 { 
01379     R ret;
01380     dbDescribeField(fd, ret);
01381     if (fd->type == dbField::tpWString) { 
01382         fd->appType = fd->type = dbField::tpMethodWString;
01383     } else { 
01384         assert(fd->type <= dbField::tpReference);
01385         fd->appType = fd->type += dbField::tpMethodBool;
01386     }
01387     fd->method = new dbMethodTrampoline<T,R>(fd, p);
01388     return fd;
01389 }

01392 
01393 #endif
